author: FE Online
title: CCS University Results 2017: Scores announced for BA, B.com, B.Sc at www.ccsuniversity.ac.in, check now!
text:
Bachelor of Vocation (B. Voc), B.Com (Var), Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA), Master of Commerce (M.Com), Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA) & LLM. 
CCS University Results 2017: Candidates who appeared for the exam can check their result by following the below-mentioned steps- Visit the official website of CCS University at www.ccsuniversity.ac.in Now click on the results tab available on the homepage Find the link to the Undergraduate Result Tab Once you enter the page click on the respective result that you wish to check Fill all the required details like your roll numbers and date of birth and press submit Once your result appears on the screen download result and take a print of the same for future use 
You may also want to watch- 
About the Chaudhary Charan Singh (CCS) University: 
Established in 1965, the Chaudhary Charan Singh University (CCSU) was earlier known as the the University of Meerut, it is one of the premier educational institutions of India that is located in Meerut, Uttar Pradesh. The university covers over 222 acres of land and has a vast, beautiful and pollution-free campus. Please Wait while comments are loading...
